Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
RegisterModuleName_Description: Denotes the module used for providing signup interface
LoginModuleName_Description: Denotes the module used for providing login interface
EnableSendInvitationLinkViaMail_Descript: If true, the module will be sending invitation links via email
NotificationType_Description: Denotes how the mail is sent - mail for standard mail() function of PHP, smtp for sending via SMTP protocol
NotificationEmail_Description: Sender email address used in mail messages sent by this module
NotificationHost_Description: SMTP server host used for sending mail by this module
NotificationUseAuth_Description: If true, SMTP authentication is used to connect to SMTP server
NotificationLogin_Description: Username used to authenticate on SMTP server
NotificationPassword_Description: Password used to authenticate on SMTP server
SMTPSecure_Description: Set to 'ssl' or 'tls' to use SSL or STARTTLS respectively
